sentences.en: A cash out button will appear when you reach the min payout.
sentences.cn: 到达最低支付时会出现按钮!

sentences.en: A typical payout about 50 percent of the earnings.
sentences.cn: 分红的部分一般占赢利的50%.

sentences.en: A typical payout is about 50 percent of the earnings.
sentences.cn: 分红的部分一般占赢利的50%.

sentences.en: In order to receive payout we need to verify your Identify.
sentences.cn: 要收到你的股份分红,我们需要核实你的身份.

sentences.en: It was for the insurance policy for Kat's mother ; there's no payout without a body.
sentences.cn: 是为了给Kat母亲的保险金.

sentences.en: Payout - Your request for your account balance.
sentences.cn: 提款 – 你提取户头结余的请求.

sentences.en: Remember we make a quicky payout in 48 hours!
sentences.cn: 我们将在48小时之内迅速支付!

sentences.en: See the current listing for hourly rates, hours and minimum payout limits on Global Earnings Table.
sentences.cn: 看到,目前上市的每小时费率, 工时和最低限额给付,对全球盈利表.

sentences.en: The dividend payout ratio indicates the amount of dividends paid relative to the company's earnings.
sentences.cn: 红利支付率即现金红利占公司净收益的百分比.

sentences.en: The lowest minimum payout limit you can select is $ 10 USD.
sentences.cn: 你能选择的最低支付限制是美元10元.

sentences.en: The minimum payout is twenty dollars.
Thus payout ratios began to rise again, to about 70 per cent today.
sentences.cn: 因此,股息支付率又开始上升, 直到目前的70%左右.

sentences.en: What payout period on investment should we strive for?
sentences.cn: 什么赢钱期投资要争取?

sentences.en: You can only request one payout at a time.
sentences.cn: 是说只能一次性申请付款,还一次只能申请一项付款.

sentences.en: You may be battling an insurance company for a payout you feel you deserve.
sentences.cn: 你可能跟保险公司有纠纷,你觉得你应该获得赔付.
